sourcesContent:
import { Component, EventEmitter, Output } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { Room } from '../../shared/models/room.models'; @Component({ selector: 'app-create-room-dialog', templateUrl: './create-room-dialog.component.html', styleUrls: ['./create-room-dialog.component.css'] }) export class CreateRoomDialogComponent { @Output() roomCreated = new EventEmitter(); @Output() dialogClosed = new EventEmitter(); createRoomForm: FormGroup; isVisible = false; constructor(private fb: FormBuilder) { this.createRoomForm = this.fb.group({ subject: ['', Validators.required], level: ['', Validators.required], topic: [''], institution: [''], focusDuration: [25, [Validators.required, Validators.min(1)]], breakDuration: [5, [Validators.required, Validators.min(1)]] }); } show(): void { this.isVisible = true; } hide(): void { this.isVisible = false; this.dialogClosed.emit(); } onSubmit(): void { if (this.createRoomForm.valid) { const newRoom: Room = { ...this.createRoomForm.value, isActive: true, timerRunning: false, isOnBreak: false }; this.roomCreated.emit(newRoom); this.hide(); this.createRoomForm.reset({ focusDuration: 25, breakDuration: 5 }); } } }
